comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: French journalist, his wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaston_Calmette He died in March 1914--assassinated by Henriette Caillaux, who was afraid he was about to reveal secret details of her personal life. (She was acquitted.)

comment._content: I was just about to google his name. Thanks :)
